mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(cidx, midx, reviewArticle, reviewScore) VALUES(#{cidx},#{midx},#{reviewArticle},#{reviewScore})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET reviewYN='Y' WHERE ridx=#{ridx}
mapper.select: select count(ridx) as cnt from review where reviewYN='N' and cidx=#{cidx}
select r.midx, m.memberName, r.reviewArticle, r.ridx, r.cidx from review r join member m on r.midx = m.midx where r.ridx=#{ridx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewReport(ridx, cidx, midx, midx2, reviewReportReason) VALUES(#{ridx},#{cidx},#{midx},#{midx2},#{reviewReportReason})
